00080 /* KEYFRAME-RANGE STUFF */
00081 
00082 /* *************************** Calculate Range ************************** */
00083 
00084 /* Get the min/max keyframes*/
00085 /* note: it should return total boundbox, filter for selection only can be argument... */
00086 void get_graph_keyframe_extents (bAnimContext *ac, float *xmin, float *xmax, float *ymin, float *ymax, const short selOnly)
00087 {
00088     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00089     bAnimListElem *ale;
00090     int filter;
00091     
00092     /* get data to filter, from Dopesheet */
00093     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
00094     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
00095     
00096     /* set large values to try to override */
00097     if (xmin) *xmin= 999999999.0f;
00098     if (xmax) *xmax= -999999999.0f;
00099     if (ymin) *ymin= 999999999.0f;
00100     if (ymax) *ymax= -999999999.0f;
00101     
00102     /* check if any channels to set range with */
00103     if (anim_data.first) {
00104         /* go through channels, finding max extents */
00105         for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
00106             AnimData *adt= ANIM_nla_mapping_get(ac, ale);
00107             FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->key_data;
00108             float txmin, txmax, tymin, tymax;
00109             float unitFac;
00110             
00111             /* get range */
00112             calc_fcurve_bounds(fcu, &txmin, &txmax, &tymin, &tymax, selOnly);
00113             
00114             /* apply NLA scaling */
00115             if (adt) {
00116                 txmin= BKE_nla_tweakedit_remap(adt, txmin, NLATIME_CONVERT_MAP);
00117                 txmax= BKE_nla_tweakedit_remap(adt, txmax, NLATIME_CONVERT_MAP);
00118             }
00119             
00120             /* apply unit corrections */
00121             unitFac= ANIM_unit_mapping_get_factor(ac->scene, ale->id, fcu, 0);
00122             tymin *= unitFac;
00123             tymax *= unitFac;
00124             
00125             /* try to set cur using these values, if they're more extreme than previously set values */
00126             if ((xmin) && (txmin < *xmin))      *xmin= txmin;
00127             if ((xmax) && (txmax > *xmax))      *xmax= txmax;
00128             if ((ymin) && (tymin < *ymin))      *ymin= tymin;
00129             if ((ymax) && (tymax > *ymax))      *ymax= tymax;
00130         }
00131         
00132         /* ensure that the extents are not too extreme that view implodes...*/
00133         if ((xmin && xmax) && (fabsf(*xmax - *xmin) < 0.1f)) *xmax += 0.1f;
00134         if ((ymin && ymax) && (fabsf(*ymax - *ymin) < 0.1f)) *ymax += 0.1f;
00135         
00136         /* free memory */
00137         BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00138     }
00139     else {
00140         /* set default range */
00141         if (ac->scene) {
00142             if (xmin) *xmin= (float)ac->scene->r.sfra;
00143             if (xmax) *xmax= (float)ac->scene->r.efra;
00144         }
00145         else {
00146             if (xmin) *xmin= -5;
00147             if (xmax) *xmax= 100;
00148         }
00149         
00150         if (ymin) *ymin= -5;
00151         if (ymax) *ymax= 5;
00152     }
00153 }

00155 /* ****************** Automatic Preview-Range Operator ****************** */
00156 
00157 static int graphkeys_previewrange_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00158 {
00159     bAnimContext ac;
00160     Scene *scene;
00161     float min, max;
00162     
00163     /* get editor data */
00164     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00165         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00166     if (ac.scene == NULL)
00167         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00168     else
00169         scene= ac.scene;
00170     
00171     /* set the range directly */
00172     get_graph_keyframe_extents(&ac, &min, &max, NULL, NULL, FALSE);
00173     scene->r.flag |= SCER_PRV_RANGE;
00174     scene->r.psfra= (int)floor(min + 0.5f);
00175     scene->r.pefra= (int)floor(max + 0.5f);
00176     
00177     /* set notifier that things have changed */
00178     // XXX err... there's nothing for frame ranges yet, but this should do fine too
00179     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_FRAME, ac.scene); 
00180     
00181     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00182 }
00183  
00184 void GRAPH_OT_previewrange_set (wmOperatorType *ot)
00185 {
00186     /* identifiers */
00187     ot->name = "Auto-Set Preview Range";
00188     ot->idname = "GRAPH_OT_previewrange_set";
00189     ot->description = "Automatically set Preview Range based on range of keyframes";
00190     
00191     /* api callbacks */
00192     ot->exec = graphkeys_previewrange_exec;
00193     ot->poll = ED_operator_graphedit_active; // XXX: unchecked poll to get fsamples working too, but makes modifier damage trickier...
00194     
00195     /* flags */
00196     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00197 }

00199 /* ****************** View-All Operator ****************** */
00200 
00201 static int graphkeys_viewall(bContext *C, const short selOnly)
00202 {
00203     bAnimContext ac;
00204     View2D *v2d;
00205     float extra;
00206 
00207     /* get editor data */
00208     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00209         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00210     v2d= &ac.ar->v2d;
00211 
00212     /* set the horizontal range, with an extra offset so that the extreme keys will be in view */
00213     get_graph_keyframe_extents(&ac, &v2d->cur.xmin, &v2d->cur.xmax, &v2d->cur.ymin, &v2d->cur.ymax, selOnly);
00214 
00215     extra= 0.1f * (v2d->cur.xmax - v2d->cur.xmin);
00216     v2d->cur.xmin -= extra;
00217     v2d->cur.xmax += extra;
00218 
00219     extra= 0.1f * (v2d->cur.ymax - v2d->cur.ymin);
00220     v2d->cur.ymin -= extra;
00221     v2d->cur.ymax += extra;
00222 
00223     /* do View2D syncing */
00224     UI_view2d_sync(CTX_wm_screen(C), CTX_wm_area(C), v2d, V2D_LOCK_COPY);
00225 
00226     /* set notifier that things have changed */
00227     ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
00228 
00229     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00230 }

00236     /* whole range */

00276 /* ******************** Create Ghost-Curves Operator *********************** */
00277 /* This operator samples the data of the selected F-Curves to F-Points, storing them
00278  * as 'ghost curves' in the active Graph Editor
00279  */
00280 
00281 /* Bake each F-Curve into a set of samples, and store as a ghost curve */
00282 static void create_ghost_curves (bAnimContext *ac, int start, int end)
00283 {   
00284     SpaceIpo *sipo= (SpaceIpo *)ac->sl;
00285     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00286     bAnimListElem *ale;
00287     int filter;
00288     
00289     /* free existing ghost curves */
00290     free_fcurves(&sipo->ghostCurves);
00291     
00292     /* sanity check */
00293     if (start >= end) {
00294         printf("Error: Frame range for Ghost F-Curve creation is inappropriate\n");
00295         return;
00296     }
00297     
00298     /* filter data */
00299     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_SEL | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
00300     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
00301     
00302     /* loop through filtered data and add keys between selected keyframes on every frame  */
00303     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
00304         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->key_data;
00305         FCurve *gcu= MEM_callocN(sizeof(FCurve), "Ghost FCurve");
00306         AnimData *adt= ANIM_nla_mapping_get(ac, ale);
00307         ChannelDriver *driver= fcu->driver;
00308         FPoint *fpt;
00309         float unitFac;
00310         int cfra;       
00311         
00312         /* disable driver so that it don't muck up the sampling process */
00313         fcu->driver= NULL;
00314         
00315         /* calculate unit-mapping factor */
00316         unitFac= ANIM_unit_mapping_get_factor(ac->scene, ale->id, fcu, 0);
00317         
00318         /* create samples, but store them in a new curve 
00319          *  - we cannot use fcurve_store_samples() as that will only overwrite the original curve 
00320          */
00321         gcu->fpt= fpt= MEM_callocN(sizeof(FPoint)*(end-start+1), "Ghost FPoint Samples");
00322         gcu->totvert= end - start + 1;
00323         
00324         /* use the sampling callback at 1-frame intervals from start to end frames */
00325         for (cfra= start; cfra <= end; cfra++, fpt++) {
00326             float cfrae= BKE_nla_tweakedit_remap(adt, cfra, NLATIME_CONVERT_UNMAP);
00327             
00328             fpt->vec[0]= cfrae;
00329             fpt->vec[1]= fcurve_samplingcb_evalcurve(fcu, NULL, cfrae) * unitFac;
00330         }
00331         
00332         /* set color of ghost curve 
00333          *  - make the color slightly darker
00334          */
00335         gcu->color[0]= fcu->color[0] - 0.07f;
00336         gcu->color[1]= fcu->color[1] - 0.07f;
00337         gcu->color[2]= fcu->color[2] - 0.07f;
00338         
00339         /* store new ghost curve */
00340         BLI_addtail(&sipo->ghostCurves, gcu);
00341         
00342         /* restore driver */
00343         fcu->driver= driver;
00344     }
00345     
00346     /* admin and redraws */
00347     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00348 }
00349 
00350 /* ------------------- */
00351 
00352 static int graphkeys_create_ghostcurves_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00353 {
00354     bAnimContext ac;
00355     View2D *v2d;
00356     int start, end;
00357     
00358     /* get editor data */
00359     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00360         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00361         
00362     /* ghost curves are snapshots of the visible portions of the curves, so set range to be the visible range */
00363     v2d= &ac.ar->v2d;
00364     start= (int)v2d->cur.xmin;
00365     end= (int)v2d->cur.xmax;
00366     
00367     /* bake selected curves into a ghost curve */
00368     create_ghost_curves(&ac, start, end);
00369     
00370     /* update this editor only */
00371     ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
00372     
00373     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00374 }
00375  
00376 void GRAPH_OT_ghost_curves_create (wmOperatorType *ot)
00377 {
00378     /* identifiers */
00379     ot->name = "Create Ghost Curves";
00380     ot->idname = "GRAPH_OT_ghost_curves_create";
00381     ot->description = "Create snapshot (Ghosts) of selected F-Curves as background aid for active Graph Editor";
00382     
00383     /* api callbacks */
00384     ot->exec = graphkeys_create_ghostcurves_exec;
00385     ot->poll = graphop_visible_keyframes_poll;
00386     
00387     /* flags */
00388     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00389     
00390     // todo: add props for start/end frames
00391 }

00393 /* ******************** Clear Ghost-Curves Operator *********************** */
00394 /* This operator clears the 'ghost curves' for the active Graph Editor */
00395 
00396 static int graphkeys_clear_ghostcurves_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00397 {
00398     bAnimContext ac;
00399     SpaceIpo *sipo;
00400     
00401     /* get editor data */
00402     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00403         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00404     sipo= (SpaceIpo *)ac.sl;
00405         
00406     /* if no ghost curves, don't do anything */
00407     if (sipo->ghostCurves.first == NULL)
00408         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00409     
00410     /* free ghost curves */
00411     free_fcurves(&sipo->ghostCurves);
00412     
00413     /* update this editor only */
00414     ED_area_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_area(C));
00415     
00416     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00417 }

00431     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00432 }

00437 /* ******************** Insert Keyframes Operator ************************* */
00438 
00439 /* defines for insert keyframes tool */
00440 static EnumPropertyItem prop_graphkeys_insertkey_types[] = {
00441     {1, "ALL", 0, "All Channels", ""},
00442     {2, "SEL", 0, "Only Selected Channels", ""},
00443     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00444 };
00445 
00446 /* this function is responsible for snapping keyframes to frame-times */
00447 static void insert_graph_keys(bAnimContext *ac, short mode) 
00448 {
00449     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00450     bAnimListElem *ale;
00451     int filter;
00452     
00453     ReportList *reports = ac->reports;
00454     Scene *scene= ac->scene;
00455     short flag = 0;
00456     
00457     /* filter data */
00458     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
00459     if (mode == 2) filter |= ANIMFILTER_SEL;
00460     
00461     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
00462     
00463     /* init keyframing flag */
00464     flag = ANIM_get_keyframing_flags(scene, 1);
00465     
00466     /* insert keyframes */
00467     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
00468         AnimData *adt= ANIM_nla_mapping_get(ac, ale);
00469         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->key_data;
00470         float cfra;
00471         
00472         /* adjust current frame for NLA-mapping */
00473         if (adt)
00474             cfra= BKE_nla_tweakedit_remap(adt, (float)CFRA, NLATIME_CONVERT_UNMAP);
00475         else 
00476             cfra= (float)CFRA;
00477             
00478         /* if there's an id */
00479         if (ale->id)
00480             insert_keyframe(reports, ale->id, NULL, ((fcu->grp)?(fcu->grp->name):(NULL)), fcu->rna_path, fcu->array_index, cfra, flag);
00481         else
00482             insert_vert_fcurve(fcu, cfra, fcu->curval, 0);
00483     }
00484     
00485     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00486 }
00487 
00488 /* ------------------- */
00489 
00490 static int graphkeys_insertkey_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00491 {
00492     bAnimContext ac;
00493     short mode;
00494     
00495     /* get editor data */
00496     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00497         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00498         
00499     /* which channels to affect? */
00500     mode= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00501     
00502     /* insert keyframes */
00503     insert_graph_keys(&ac, mode);
00504     
00505     /* validate keyframes after editing */
00506     ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
00507     
00508     /* set notifier that keyframes have changed */
00509     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00510     
00511     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00512 }

00514 void GRAPH_OT_keyframe_insert (wmOperatorType *ot)
00515 {
00516     /* identifiers */
00517     ot->name = "Insert Keyframes";
00518     ot->idname = "GRAPH_OT_keyframe_insert";
00519     ot->description = "Insert keyframes for the specified channels";
00520     
00521     /* api callbacks */
00522     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
00523     ot->exec = graphkeys_insertkey_exec;
00524     ot->poll = graphop_editable_keyframes_poll;
00525     
00526     /* flags */
00527     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00528     
00529     /* id-props */
00530     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", prop_graphkeys_insertkey_types, 0, "Type", "");
00531 }
00532 
00533 /* ******************** Click-Insert Keyframes Operator ************************* */
00534 
00535 static int graphkeys_click_insert_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00536 {
00537     bAnimContext ac;
00538     bAnimListElem *ale;
00539     AnimData *adt;
00540     FCurve *fcu;
00541     float frame, val;
00542     
00543     /* get animation context */
00544     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00545         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00546     
00547     /* get active F-Curve 'anim-list-element' */
00548     ale= get_active_fcurve_channel(&ac);
00549     if (ELEM(NULL, ale, ale->data)) {
00550         if (ale) MEM_freeN(ale);
00551         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00552     }
00553     fcu = ale->data;
00554     
00555     /* when there are F-Modifiers on the curve, only allow adding
00556      * keyframes if these will be visible after doing so...
00557      */
00558     if (fcurve_is_keyframable(fcu)) {
00559         /* get frame and value from props */
00560         frame= RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "frame");
00561         val= RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "value");
00562         
00563         /* apply inverse NLA-mapping to frame to get correct time in un-scaled action */
00564         adt= ANIM_nla_mapping_get(&ac, ale);
00565         frame= BKE_nla_tweakedit_remap(adt, frame, NLATIME_CONVERT_UNMAP);
00566         
00567         /* apply inverse unit-mapping to value to get correct value for F-Curves */
00568         val *= ANIM_unit_mapping_get_factor(ac.scene, ale->id, fcu, 1);
00569         
00570         /* insert keyframe on the specified frame + value */
00571         insert_vert_fcurve(fcu, frame, val, 0);
00572     }
00573     else {
00574         /* warn about why this can't happen */
00575         if (fcu->fpt)
00576             BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Keyframes cannot be added to sampled F-Curves");
00577         else if (fcu->flag & FCURVE_PROTECTED)
00578             BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Active F-Curve is not editable");
00579         else
00580             BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Remove F-Modifiers from F-Curve to add keyframes");
00581     }
00582     
00583     /* free temp data */
00584     MEM_freeN(ale);
00585     
00586     /* set notifier that keyframes have changed */
00587     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00588     
00589     /* done */
00590     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00591 }
00592 
00593 static int graphkeys_click_insert_invoke (bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *evt)
00594 {
00595     bAnimContext ac;
00596     ARegion *ar;
00597     View2D *v2d;
00598     int mval[2];
00599     float x, y;
00600     
00601     /* get animation context */
00602     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00603         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00604     
00605     /* store mouse coordinates in View2D space, into the operator's properties */
00606     ar= ac.ar;
00607     v2d= &ar->v2d;
00608     
00609     mval[0]= (evt->x - ar->winrct.xmin);
00610     mval[1]= (evt->y - ar->winrct.ymin);
00611     
00612     UI_view2d_region_to_view(v2d, mval[0], mval[1], &x, &y);
00613     
00614     RNA_float_set(op->ptr, "frame", x);
00615     RNA_float_set(op->ptr, "value", y);
00616     
00617     /* run exec now */
00618     return graphkeys_click_insert_exec(C, op);
00619 }
00620

00622 {
00623     /* identifiers */
00624     ot->name = "Click-Insert Keyframes";
00625     ot->idname = "GRAPH_OT_click_insert";
00626     ot->description = "Insert new keyframe at the cursor position for the active F-Curve";
00627     
00628     /* api callbacks */
00629     ot->invoke = graphkeys_click_insert_invoke;
00630     ot->exec = graphkeys_click_insert_exec;
00631     ot->poll = graphop_active_fcurve_poll;
00632     
00633     /* flags */
00634     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00635     
00636     /* properties */
00637     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "frame", 1.0f, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, "Frame Number", "Frame to insert keyframe on", 0, 100);
00638     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "value", 1.0f, -FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, "Value", "Value for keyframe on", 0, 100);
00639 }

00641 /* ******************** Copy/Paste Keyframes Operator ************************* */
00642 /* NOTE: the backend code for this is shared with the dopesheet editor */
00643 
00644 static short copy_graph_keys (bAnimContext *ac)
00645 {   
00646     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00647     int filter, ok=0;
00648     
00649     /* clear buffer first */
00650     free_anim_copybuf();
00651     
00652     /* filter data */
00653     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
00654     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
00655     
00656     /* copy keyframes */
00657     ok= copy_animedit_keys(ac, &anim_data);
00658     
00659     /* clean up */
00660     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00661 
00662     return ok;
00663 }
00664 
00665 static short paste_graph_keys (bAnimContext *ac,
00666     const eKeyPasteOffset offset_mode, const eKeyMergeMode merge_mode)
00667 {   
00668     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00669     int filter, ok=0;
00670     
00671     /* filter data */
00672     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_SEL | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
00673     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
00674     
00675     /* paste keyframes */
00676     ok= paste_animedit_keys(ac, &anim_data, offset_mode, merge_mode);
00677     
00678     /* clean up */
00679     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00680 
00681     return ok;
00682 }
00683 
00684 /* ------------------- */
00685 
00686 static int graphkeys_copy_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00687 {
00688     bAnimContext ac;
00689     
00690     /* get editor data */
00691     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00692         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00693     
00694     /* copy keyframes */
00695     if (copy_graph_keys(&ac)) { 
00696         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "No keyframes copied to keyframes copy/paste buffer");
00697         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00698     }
00699     
00700     /* just return - no operator needed here (no changes) */
00701     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00702 }
00703  
00704 void GRAPH_OT_copy (wmOperatorType *ot)
00705 {
00706     /* identifiers */
00707     ot->name = "Copy Keyframes";
00708     ot->idname = "GRAPH_OT_copy";
00709     ot->description = "Copy selected keyframes to the copy/paste buffer";
00710     
00711     /* api callbacks */
00712     ot->exec = graphkeys_copy_exec;
00713     ot->poll = graphop_editable_keyframes_poll;
00714     
00715     /* flags */
00716     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00717 }
00718 
00719 
00720 
00721 static int graphkeys_paste_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00722 {
00723     bAnimContext ac;
00724 
00725     const eKeyPasteOffset offset_mode= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "offset");
00726     const eKeyMergeMode merge_mode= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "merge");
00727     
00728     /* get editor data */
00729     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00730         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00731     
00732     /* ac.reports by default will be the global reports list, which won't show warnings */
00733     ac.reports= op->reports;
00734 
00735     /* paste keyframes - non-zero return means an error occurred while trying to paste */
00736     if (paste_graph_keys(&ac, offset_mode, merge_mode)) {
00737         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00738     }
00739     
00740     /* validate keyframes after editing */
00741     ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
00742     
00743     /* set notifier that keyframes have changed */
00744     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00745     
00746     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00747 }
00748  
00749 void GRAPH_OT_paste (wmOperatorType *ot)
00750 {
00751     /* identifiers */
00752     ot->name = "Paste Keyframes";
00753     ot->idname = "GRAPH_OT_paste";
00754     ot->description = "Paste keyframes from copy/paste buffer for the selected channels, starting on the current frame";
00755     
00756     /* api callbacks */
00757 //  ot->invoke = WM_operator_props_popup; // better wait for graph redo panel
00758     ot->exec = graphkeys_paste_exec;
00759     ot->poll = graphop_editable_keyframes_poll;
00760     
00761     /* flags */
00762     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00763 
00764     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "offset", keyframe_paste_offset_items, KEYFRAME_PASTE_OFFSET_CFRA_START, "Offset", "Paste time offset of keys");
00765     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "merge", keyframe_paste_merge_items, KEYFRAME_PASTE_MERGE_MIX, "Type", "Method of merging pasted keys and existing");
00766 }

00768 /* ******************** Duplicate Keyframes Operator ************************* */
00769 
00770 static void duplicate_graph_keys (bAnimContext *ac)
00771 {
00772     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00773     bAnimListElem *ale;
00774     int filter;
00775     
00776     /* filter data */
00777     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
00778     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
00779     
00780     /* loop through filtered data and delete selected keys */
00781     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
00782         duplicate_fcurve_keys((FCurve *)ale->key_data);
00783     }
00784     
00785     /* free filtered list */
00786     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00787 }
00788

00796     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00797         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00798         
00799     /* duplicate keyframes */
00800     duplicate_graph_keys(&ac);
00801     
00802     /* validate keyframes after editing */
00803     ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
00804     
00805     /* set notifier that keyframes have changed */
00806     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00807     
00808     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00809 }

00836 
00837 /* ******************** Delete Keyframes Operator ************************* */
00838 
00839 static void delete_graph_keys (bAnimContext *ac)
00840 {
00841     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00842     bAnimListElem *ale;
00843     int filter;
00844     
00845     /* filter data */
00846     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
00847     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
00848     
00849     /* loop through filtered data and delete selected keys */
00850     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
00851         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->key_data;
00852         AnimData *adt= ale->adt;
00853         
00854         /* delete selected keyframes only */
00855         delete_fcurve_keys(fcu); 
00856         
00857         /* Only delete curve too if it won't be doing anything anymore */
00858         if ((fcu->totvert == 0) && (list_has_suitable_fmodifier(&fcu->modifiers, 0, FMI_TYPE_GENERATE_CURVE) == 0))
00859             ANIM_fcurve_delete_from_animdata(ac, adt, fcu);
00860     }
00861     
00862     /* free filtered list */
00863     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00864 }
00865 
00866 /* ------------------- */
00867 
00868 static int graphkeys_delete_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00869 {
00870     bAnimContext ac;
00871     
00872     /* get editor data */
00873     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
00874         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00875         
00876     /* delete keyframes */
00877     delete_graph_keys(&ac);
00878     
00879     /* validate keyframes after editing */
00880     ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
00881     
00882     /* set notifier that keyframes have changed */
00883     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00884     
00885     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00886 }

00904 /* ******************** Clean Keyframes Operator ************************* */
00905 
00906 static void clean_graph_keys (bAnimContext *ac, float thresh)
00907 {   
00908     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00909     bAnimListElem *ale;
00910     int filter;
00911     
00912     /* filter data */
00913     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_SEL | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
00914     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
00915     
00916     /* loop through filtered data and clean curves */
00917     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next)
00918         clean_fcurve((FCurve *)ale->key_data, thresh);
00919     
00920     /* free temp data */
00921     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
00922 }
00923

00927 {

00929     float thresh;

00931     /* get editor data */

00933         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00934         
00935     /* get cleaning threshold */
00936     thresh= RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "threshold");
00937     
00938     /* clean keyframes */
00939     clean_graph_keys(&ac, thresh);
00940     
00941     /* validate keyframes after editing */
00942     ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
00943     
00944     /* set notifier that keyframes have changed */
00945     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00946     
00947     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00948 }

00968 
00969 /* ******************** Bake F-Curve Operator *********************** */
00970 /* This operator bakes the data of the selected F-Curves to F-Points */
00971 
00972 /* Bake each F-Curve into a set of samples */
00973 static void bake_graph_curves (bAnimContext *ac, int start, int end)
00974 {   
00975     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
00976     bAnimListElem *ale;
00977     int filter;
00978     
00979     /* filter data */
00980     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_SEL | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
00981     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
00982     
00983     /* loop through filtered data and add keys between selected keyframes on every frame  */
00984     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
00985         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->key_data;
00986         ChannelDriver *driver= fcu->driver;
00987         
00988         /* disable driver so that it don't muck up the sampling process */
00989         fcu->driver= NULL;
00990         
00991         /* create samples */
00992         fcurve_store_samples(fcu, NULL, start, end, fcurve_samplingcb_evalcurve);
00993         
00994         /* restore driver */
00995         fcu->driver= driver;
00996     }
00997     
00998     /* admin and redraws */
00999     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
01000 }
01001 
01002 /* ------------------- */
01003 
01004 static int graphkeys_bake_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01005 {
01006     bAnimContext ac;
01007     Scene *scene= NULL;
01008     int start, end;
01009     
01010     /* get editor data */
01011     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
01012         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01013         
01014     /* for now, init start/end from preview-range extents */
01015     // TODO: add properties for this 
01016     scene= ac.scene;
01017     start= PSFRA;
01018     end= PEFRA;
01019     
01020     /* bake keyframes */
01021     bake_graph_curves(&ac, start, end);
01022     
01023     /* validate keyframes after editing */
01024     ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
01025     
01026     /* set notifier that keyframes have changed */
01027     // NOTE: some distinction between order/number of keyframes and type should be made?
01028     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
01029     
01030     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01031 }
01032  
01033 void GRAPH_OT_bake (wmOperatorType *ot)
01034 {
01035     /* identifiers */
01036     ot->name = "Bake Curve";
01037     ot->idname = "GRAPH_OT_bake";
01038     ot->description = "Bake selected F-Curves to a set of sampled points defining a similar curve";
01039     
01040     /* api callbacks */
01041     ot->invoke = WM_operator_confirm; // FIXME...
01042     ot->exec = graphkeys_bake_exec;
01043     ot->poll = graphop_selected_fcurve_poll; 
01044     
01045     /* flags */
01046     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01047     
01048     // todo: add props for start/end frames
01049 }
01050 
01051 #ifdef WITH_AUDASPACE
01052 
01053 /* ******************** Sound Bake F-Curve Operator *********************** */
01054 /* This operator bakes the given sound to the selected F-Curves */
01055 
01056 /* ------------------- */
01057 
01058 /* Custom data storage passed to the F-Sample-ing function,
01059  * which provides the necessary info for baking the sound
01060  */
01061 typedef struct tSoundBakeInfo {
01062     float *samples;
01063     int length;
01064     int cfra;
01065 } tSoundBakeInfo;
01066 
01067 /* ------------------- */
01068 
01069 /* Sampling callback used to determine the value from the sound to
01070  * save in the F-Curve at the specified frame
01071  */
01072 static float fcurve_samplingcb_sound (FCurve *UNUSED(fcu), void *data, float evaltime)
01073 {
01074     tSoundBakeInfo *sbi= (tSoundBakeInfo *)data;
01075 
01076     int position = evaltime - sbi->cfra;
01077     if ((position < 0) || (position >= sbi->length))
01078         return 0.0f;
01079 
01080     return sbi->samples[position];
01081 }
01082 
01083 /* ------------------- */
01084 
01085 static int graphkeys_sound_bake_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01086 {
01087     bAnimContext ac;
01088     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
01089     bAnimListElem *ale;
01090     int filter;
01091 
01092     tSoundBakeInfo sbi;
01093     Scene *scene= NULL;
01094     int start, end;
01095 
01096     char path[FILE_MAX];
01097 
01098     /* get editor data */
01099     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
01100         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01101 
01102     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
01103 
01104     scene= ac.scene;    /* current scene */
01105 
01106     /* store necessary data for the baking steps */
01107     sbi.samples = AUD_readSoundBuffer(path,
01108                                       RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "low"),
01109                                       RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "high"),
01110                                       RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "attack"),
01111                                       RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "release"),
01112                                       RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "threshold"),
01113                                       RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "accumulate"),
01114                                       RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "use_additive"),
01115                                       RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "square"),
01116                                       RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "sthreshold"),
01117                                       FPS, &sbi.length);
01118 
01119     if (sbi.samples == NULL) {
01120         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Unsupported audio format");
01121         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01122     }
01123 
01124     /* determine extents of the baking */
01125     sbi.cfra = start = CFRA;
01126     end = CFRA + sbi.length - 1;
01127 
01128     /* filter anim channels */
01129     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_SEL | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
01130     ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
01131 
01132     /* loop through all selected F-Curves, replacing its data with the sound samples */
01133     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
01134         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->key_data;
01135         
01136         /* sample the sound */
01137         fcurve_store_samples(fcu, &sbi, start, end, fcurve_samplingcb_sound);
01138     }
01139 
01140     /* free sample data */
01141     free(sbi.samples);
01142 
01143     /* admin and redraws */
01144     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
01145 
01146     /* validate keyframes after editing */
01147     ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
01148 
01149     /* set notifier that 'keyframes' have changed */
01150     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
01151 
01152     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01153 }
01154 
01155 #else //WITH_AUDASPACE
01156 
01157 static int graphkeys_sound_bake_exec(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmOperator *op)
01158 {
01159     BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Compiled without sound support");
01160 
01161     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01162 }
01163 
01164 #endif //WITH_AUDASPACE
01165 
01166 static int graphkeys_sound_bake_invoke (bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01167 {
01168     bAnimContext ac;
01169 
01170     /* verify editor data */
01171     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
01172         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01173 
01174     return WM_operator_filesel(C, op, event);
01175 }
01176 
01177 void GRAPH_OT_sound_bake (wmOperatorType *ot)
01178 {
01179     /* identifiers */
01180     ot->name = "Bake Sound to F-Curves";
01181     ot->idname = "GRAPH_OT_sound_bake";
01182     ot->description = "Bakes a sound wave to selected F-Curves";
01183 
01184     /* api callbacks */
01185     ot->invoke = graphkeys_sound_bake_invoke;
01186     ot->exec = graphkeys_sound_bake_exec;
01187     ot->poll = graphop_selected_fcurve_poll;
01188 
01189     /* flags */
01190     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01191 
01192     /* properties */
01193     WM_operator_properties_filesel(ot, FOLDERFILE|SOUNDFILE|MOVIEFILE, FILE_SPECIAL, FILE_OPENFILE, WM_FILESEL_FILEPATH, FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
01194     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "low", 0.0f, 0.0, 100000.0, "Lowest frequency", "", 0.1, 1000.00);
01195     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "high", 100000.0, 0.0, 100000.0, "Highest frequency", "", 0.1, 1000.00);
01196     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "attack", 0.005, 0.0, 2.0, "Attack time", "", 0.01, 0.1);
01197     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "release", 0.2, 0.0, 5.0, "Release time", "", 0.01, 0.2);
01198     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "threshold", 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, "Threshold", "", 0.01, 0.1);
01199     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "accumulate", 0, "Accumulate", "");
01200     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "use_additive", 0, "Additive", "");
01201     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "square", 0, "Square", "");
01202     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "sthreshold", 0.1, 0.0, 1.0, "Square Threshold", "", 0.01, 0.1);
01203 }
01204 
01205 /* ******************** Sample Keyframes Operator *********************** */
01206 /* This operator 'bakes' the values of the curve into new keyframes between pairs
01207  * of selected keyframes. It is useful for creating keyframes for tweaking overlap.
01208  */
01209 
01210 /* Evaluates the curves between each selected keyframe on each frame, and keys the value  */
01211 static void sample_graph_keys (bAnimContext *ac)
01212 {   
01213     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
01214     bAnimListElem *ale;
01215     int filter;
01216     
01217     /* filter data */
01218     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
01219     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
01220     
01221     /* loop through filtered data and add keys between selected keyframes on every frame  */
01222     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next)
01223         sample_fcurve((FCurve *)ale->key_data);
01224     
01225     /* admin and redraws */
01226     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
01227 }
01228 
01229 /* ------------------- */
01230 
01231 static int graphkeys_sample_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01232 {
01233     bAnimContext ac;
01234     
01235     /* get editor data */
01236     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
01237         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01238     
01239     /* sample keyframes */
01240     sample_graph_keys(&ac);
01241     
01242     /* validate keyframes after editing */
01243     ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
01244     
01245     /* set notifier that keyframes have changed */
01246     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
01247     
01248     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01249 }
01250  
01251 void GRAPH_OT_sample (wmOperatorType *ot)
01252 {
01253     /* identifiers */
01254     ot->name = "Sample Keyframes";
01255     ot->idname = "GRAPH_OT_sample";
01256     ot->description = "Add keyframes on every frame between the selected keyframes";
01257     
01258     /* api callbacks */
01259     ot->exec = graphkeys_sample_exec;
01260     ot->poll = graphop_editable_keyframes_poll;
01261     
01262     /* flags */
01263     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01264 }
01265 
01266 
01267 /* ************************************************************************** */
01268 /* SETTINGS STUFF */
01269 
01270 /* ******************** Set Extrapolation-Type Operator *********************** */
01271 
01272 /* defines for make/clear cyclic extrapolation tools */
01273 #define MAKE_CYCLIC_EXPO    -1
01274 #define CLEAR_CYCLIC_EXPO   -2
01275 
01276 /* defines for set extrapolation-type for selected keyframes tool */
01277 static EnumPropertyItem prop_graphkeys_expo_types[] = {
01278     {FCURVE_EXTRAPOLATE_CONSTANT, "CONSTANT", 0, "Constant Extrapolation", ""},
01279     {FCURVE_EXTRAPOLATE_LINEAR, "LINEAR", 0, "Linear Extrapolation", ""},
01280     
01281     {MAKE_CYCLIC_EXPO, "MAKE_CYCLIC", 0, "Make Cyclic (F-Modifier)", "Add Cycles F-Modifier if one doesn't exist already"},
01282     {CLEAR_CYCLIC_EXPO, "CLEAR_CYCLIC", 0, "Clear Cyclic (F-Modifier)", "Remove Cycles F-Modifier if not needed anymore"},
01283     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
01284 };
01285 
01286 /* this function is responsible for setting extrapolation mode for keyframes */
01287 static void setexpo_graph_keys(bAnimContext *ac, short mode) 
01288 {
01289     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
01290     bAnimListElem *ale;
01291     int filter;
01292     
01293     /* filter data */
01294     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_SEL | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
01295     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
01296     
01297     /* loop through setting mode per F-Curve */
01298     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
01299         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->data;
01300         
01301         if (mode >= 0) {
01302             /* just set mode setting */
01303             fcu->extend= mode;
01304         }
01305         else {
01306             /* shortcuts for managing Cycles F-Modifiers to make it easier to toggle cyclic animation 
01307              * without having to go through FModifier UI in Graph Editor to do so
01308              */
01309             if (mode == MAKE_CYCLIC_EXPO) {
01310                 /* only add if one doesn't exist */
01311                 if (list_has_suitable_fmodifier(&fcu->modifiers, FMODIFIER_TYPE_CYCLES, -1) == 0) {
01312                     // TODO: add some more preset versions which set different extrapolation options?
01313                     add_fmodifier(&fcu->modifiers, FMODIFIER_TYPE_CYCLES);
01314                 }
01315             }
01316             else if (mode == CLEAR_CYCLIC_EXPO) {
01317                 /* remove all the modifiers fitting this description */
01318                 FModifier *fcm, *fcn=NULL;
01319                 
01320                 for (fcm = fcu->modifiers.first; fcm; fcm = fcn) {
01321                     fcn = fcm->next;
01322                     
01323                     if (fcm->type == FMODIFIER_TYPE_CYCLES)
01324                         remove_fmodifier(&fcu->modifiers, fcm);
01325                 }
01326             }
01327         }
01328     }
01329     
01330     /* cleanup */
01331     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
01332 }
01333 
01334 /* ------------------- */
01335 
01336 static int graphkeys_expo_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01337 {
01338     bAnimContext ac;
01339     short mode;
01340     
01341     /* get editor data */
01342     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
01343         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01344         
01345     /* get handle setting mode */
01346     mode= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
01347     
01348     /* set handle type */
01349     setexpo_graph_keys(&ac, mode);
01350     
01351     /* validate keyframes after editing */
01352     ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
01353     
01354     /* set notifier that keyframe properties have changed */
01355     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME_PROP, NULL);
01356     
01357     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01358 }
01359

01362     /* identifiers */

01365     ot->description = "Set extrapolation mode for selected F-Curves";
01366     
01367     /* api callbacks */
01368     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;

01370     ot->poll = graphop_editable_keyframes_poll;
01371

01377 }

01384     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};

01386     int filter;
01387     KeyframeEditFunc set_cb= ANIM_editkeyframes_ipo(mode);
01388     
01389     /* filter data */

01392

01394      * Note: we do not supply KeyframeEditData to the looper yet. Currently that's not necessary here...
01395      */
01396     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next)
01397         ANIM_fcurve_keyframes_loop(NULL, ale->key_data, NULL, set_cb, calchandles_fcurve);
01398     
01399     /* cleanup */
01400     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
01401 }

01448 /* ******************** Set Handle-Type Operator *********************** */
01449 
01450 /* this function is responsible for setting handle-type of selected keyframes */
01451 static void sethandles_graph_keys(bAnimContext *ac, short mode) 
01452 {
01453     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
01454     bAnimListElem *ale;
01455     int filter;
01456     
01457     KeyframeEditFunc edit_cb= ANIM_editkeyframes_handles(mode);
01458     KeyframeEditFunc sel_cb= ANIM_editkeyframes_ok(BEZT_OK_SELECTED);
01459     
01460     /* filter data */
01461     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
01462     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
01463     
01464     /* loop through setting flags for handles 
01465      * Note: we do not supply KeyframeEditData to the looper yet. Currently that's not necessary here...
01466      */
01467     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
01468         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->key_data;
01469         
01470         /* any selected keyframes for editing? */
01471         if (ANIM_fcurve_keyframes_loop(NULL, fcu, NULL, sel_cb, NULL)) {
01472             /* change type of selected handles */
01473             ANIM_fcurve_keyframes_loop(NULL, fcu, NULL, edit_cb, calchandles_fcurve);
01474         }
01475     }
01476     
01477     /* cleanup */
01478     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
01479 }

01493     
01494     /* set handle type */

01496

01499     
01500     /* set notifier that keyframe properties have changed */
01501     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME_PROP, NULL);
01502     
01503     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01504 }

01524 
01525 /* ************************************************************************** */
01526 /* TRANSFORM STUFF */
01527 
01528 /* ***************** 'Euler Filter' Operator **************************** */
01529 /* Euler filter tools (as seen in Maya), are necessary for working with 'baked'
01530  * rotation curves (with Euler rotations). The main purpose of such tools is to
01531  * resolve any discontinuities that may arise in the curves due to the clamping
01532  * of values to -180 degrees to 180 degrees.
01533  */
01534 
01535 /* set of three euler-rotation F-Curves */
01536 typedef struct tEulerFilter {
01537     struct tEulerFilter *next, *prev;
01538     
01539     ID *id;                         /* ID-block which owns the channels */
01540     FCurve *(fcurves[3]);           /* 3 Pointers to F-Curves */    
01541     char *rna_path;                 /* Pointer to one of the RNA Path's used by one of the F-Curves */
01542 } tEulerFilter;
01543  
01544 static int graphkeys_euler_filter_exec (bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01545 {
01546     bAnimContext ac;
01547     
01548     ListBase anim_data= {NULL, NULL};
01549     bAnimListElem *ale;
01550     int filter;
01551     
01552     ListBase eulers = {NULL, NULL};
01553     tEulerFilter *euf= NULL;
01554     int groups=0, failed=0;
01555     
01556     /* get editor data */
01557     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
01558         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01559         
01560     /* The process is done in two passes:
01561      *   1) Sets of three related rotation curves are identified from the selected channels,
01562      *      and are stored as a single 'operation unit' for the next step
01563      *   2) Each set of three F-Curves is processed for each keyframe, with the values being
01564      *      processed as necessary
01565      */
01566      
01567     /* step 1: extract only the rotation f-curves */
01568     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_SEL | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
01569     ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
01570     
01571     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
01572         FCurve *fcu = (FCurve *)ale->data;
01573         
01574         /* check if this is an appropriate F-Curve 
01575          *  - only rotation curves
01576          *  - for pchan curves, make sure we're only using the euler curves
01577          */
01578         if (strstr(fcu->rna_path, "rotation_euler") == NULL)
01579             continue;
01580         else if (ELEM3(fcu->array_index, 0, 1, 2) == 0) {
01581             BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_WARNING,
01582                 "Euler Rotation F-Curve has invalid index (ID='%s', Path='%s', Index=%d)", 
01583                 (ale->id)? ale->id->name:"<No ID>", fcu->rna_path, fcu->array_index);
01584             continue;
01585         }
01586         
01587         /* optimization: assume that xyz curves will always be stored consecutively,
01588          * so if the paths or the ID's don't match up, then a curve needs to be added 
01589          * to a new group
01590          */
01591         if ((euf) && (euf->id == ale->id) && (strcmp(euf->rna_path, fcu->rna_path)==0)) {
01592             /* this should be fine to add to the existing group then */
01593             euf->fcurves[fcu->array_index]= fcu;
01594         }
01595         else {
01596             /* just add to a new block */
01597             euf= MEM_callocN(sizeof(tEulerFilter), "tEulerFilter");
01598             BLI_addtail(&eulers, euf);
01599             groups++;
01600             
01601             euf->id= ale->id;
01602             euf->rna_path = fcu->rna_path; /* this should be safe, since we're only using it for a short time */
01603             euf->fcurves[fcu->array_index]= fcu;
01604         }
01605     }
01606     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
01607     
01608     if (groups == 0) {
01609         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_WARNING, "No Euler Rotation F-Curves to fix up");
01610         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01611     }
01612     
01613     /* step 2: go through each set of curves, processing the values at each keyframe 
01614      *  - it is assumed that there must be a full set of keyframes at each keyframe position
01615      */
01616     for (euf= eulers.first; euf; euf= euf->next) {
01617         int f;
01618         
01619         /* sanity check: ensure that there are enough F-Curves to work on in this group */
01620         // TODO: also enforce assumption that there be a full set of keyframes at each position by ensuring that totvert counts are same?
01621         if (ELEM3(NULL, euf->fcurves[0], euf->fcurves[1], euf->fcurves[2])) {
01622             /* report which components are missing */
01623             BKE_reportf(op->reports, RPT_WARNING,
01624                 "Missing %s%s%s component(s) of euler rotation for ID='%s' and RNA-Path='%s'",
01625                 (euf->fcurves[0]==NULL)? "X":"",
01626                 (euf->fcurves[1]==NULL)? "Y":"",
01627                 (euf->fcurves[2]==NULL)? "Z":"",
01628                 euf->id->name, euf->rna_path);
01629                 
01630             /* keep track of number of failed sets, and carry on to next group */
01631             failed++;
01632             continue;
01633         }
01634         
01635         /* simple method: just treat any difference between keys of greater than 180 degrees as being a flip */
01636         // FIXME: there are more complicated methods that will be needed to fix more cases than just some
01637         for (f = 0; f < 3; f++) {
01638             FCurve *fcu = euf->fcurves[f];
01639             BezTriple *bezt, *prev=NULL;
01640             unsigned int i;
01641             
01642             /* skip if not enough vets to do a decent analysis of... */
01643             if (fcu->totvert <= 2)
01644                 continue;
01645             
01646             /* prev follows bezt, bezt = "current" point to be fixed */
01647             for (i=0, bezt=fcu->bezt; i < fcu->totvert; i++, prev=bezt, bezt++) {
01648                 /* our method depends on determining a "difference" from the previous vert */
01649                 if (prev == NULL)
01650                     continue;
01651                 
01652                 /* > 180 degree flip? */
01653                 if (fabs(prev->vec[1][1] - bezt->vec[1][1]) >= M_PI) {
01654                     /* 360 degrees to add/subtract frame value until difference is acceptably small that there's no more flip */
01655                     const float fac = 2.0f * (float)M_PI;
01656                     
01657                     if (prev->vec[1][1] > bezt->vec[1][1]) {
01658                         while (fabsf(bezt->vec[1][1] - prev->vec[1][1]) >= (float)M_PI) {
01659                             bezt->vec[0][1] += fac;
01660                             bezt->vec[1][1] += fac;
01661                             bezt->vec[2][1] += fac;
01662                         }
01663                     }
01664                     else /* if (prev->vec[1][1] < bezt->vec[1][1]) */ {
01665                         while (fabsf(bezt->vec[1][1] - prev->vec[1][1]) >= (float)M_PI) {
01666                             bezt->vec[0][1] -= fac;
01667                             bezt->vec[1][1] -= fac;
01668                             bezt->vec[2][1] -= fac;
01669                         }
01670                     }
01671                 }
01672             }
01673         }
01674     }
01675     BLI_freelistN(&eulers);
01676     
01677     /* updates + finishing warnings */
01678     if (failed == groups) {
01679         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, 
01680             "No Euler Rotations could be corrected, ensure each rotation has keys for all components, and that F-Curves for these are in consecutive XYZ order and selected");
01681         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01682     }
01683     else {
01684         if (failed) {
01685             BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR,
01686                 "Some Euler Rotations couldn't be corrected due to missing/unselected/out-of-order F-Curves, ensure each rotation has keys for all components, and that F-Curves for these are in consecutive XYZ order and selected");
01687         }
01688         
01689         /* validate keyframes after editing */
01690         ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
01691         
01692         /* set notifier that keyframes have changed */
01693         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
01694         
01695         /* done at last */
01696         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01697     }
01698 }
01699  
01700 void GRAPH_OT_euler_filter (wmOperatorType *ot)
01701 {
01702     /* identifiers */
01703     ot->name = "Euler Discontinuity Filter";
01704     ot->idname = "GRAPH_OT_euler_filter";
01705     ot->description = "Fixes the most common causes of gimbal lock in the selected Euler Rotation F-Curves";
01706     
01707     /* api callbacks */
01708     ot->exec = graphkeys_euler_filter_exec;
01709     ot->poll = graphop_editable_keyframes_poll;
01710     
01711     /* flags */
01712     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01713 }
01714 
01715 /* ***************** Jump to Selected Frames Operator *********************** */
01716 
01717 /* snap current-frame indicator to 'average time' of selected keyframe */
01718 static int graphkeys_framejump_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01719 {
01720     bAnimContext ac;
01721     ListBase anim_data= {NULL, NULL};
01722     bAnimListElem *ale;
01723     int filter;
01724     KeyframeEditData ked;
01725     
01726     /* get editor data */
01727     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
01728         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01729     
01730     /* init edit data */
01731     memset(&ked, 0, sizeof(KeyframeEditData));
01732     
01733     /* loop over action data, averaging values */
01734     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
01735     ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
01736     
01737     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
01738         AnimData *adt= ANIM_nla_mapping_get(&ac, ale);
01739         
01740         /* apply unit corrections */
01741         ANIM_unit_mapping_apply_fcurve(ac.scene, ale->id, ale->key_data, ANIM_UNITCONV_ONLYKEYS);
01742         
01743         if (adt) {
01744             ANIM_nla_mapping_apply_fcurve(adt, ale->key_data, 0, 1); 
01745             ANIM_fcurve_keyframes_loop(&ked, ale->key_data, NULL, bezt_calc_average, NULL);
01746             ANIM_nla_mapping_apply_fcurve(adt, ale->key_data, 1, 1); 
01747         }
01748         else
01749             ANIM_fcurve_keyframes_loop(&ked, ale->key_data, NULL, bezt_calc_average, NULL);
01750         
01751         /* unapply unit corrections */
01752         ANIM_unit_mapping_apply_fcurve(ac.scene, ale->id, ale->key_data, ANIM_UNITCONV_RESTORE|ANIM_UNITCONV_ONLYKEYS);
01753     }
01754     
01755     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
01756     
01757     /* set the new current frame and cursor values, based on the average time and value */
01758     if (ked.i1) {
01759         SpaceIpo *sipo= (SpaceIpo *)ac.sl;
01760         Scene *scene= ac.scene;
01761         
01762         /* take the average values, rounding to the nearest int for the current frame */
01763         CFRA= (int)floor((ked.f1 / ked.i1) + 0.5f);
01764         SUBFRA= 0.f;
01765         sipo->cursorVal= ked.f2 / (float)ked.i1;
01766     }
01767     
01768     /* set notifier that things have changed */
01769     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_FRAME, ac.scene);
01770     
01771     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01772 }
01773

01789 /* ******************** Snap Keyframes Operator *********************** */
01790 
01791 /* defines for snap keyframes tool */
01792 static EnumPropertyItem prop_graphkeys_snap_types[] = {
01793     {GRAPHKEYS_SNAP_CFRA, "CFRA", 0, "Current Frame", ""},
01794     {GRAPHKEYS_SNAP_VALUE, "VALUE", 0, "Cursor Value", ""},
01795     {GRAPHKEYS_SNAP_NEAREST_FRAME, "NEAREST_FRAME", 0, "Nearest Frame", ""}, // XXX as single entry?
01796     {GRAPHKEYS_SNAP_NEAREST_SECOND, "NEAREST_SECOND", 0, "Nearest Second", ""}, // XXX as single entry?
01797     {GRAPHKEYS_SNAP_NEAREST_MARKER, "NEAREST_MARKER", 0, "Nearest Marker", ""},
01798     {GRAPHKEYS_SNAP_HORIZONTAL, "HORIZONTAL", 0, "Flatten Handles", ""},
01799     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
01800 };
01801 
01802 /* this function is responsible for snapping keyframes to frame-times */
01803 static void snap_graph_keys(bAnimContext *ac, short mode) 
01804 {
01805     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
01806     bAnimListElem *ale;
01807     int filter;
01808     
01809     KeyframeEditData ked;
01810     KeyframeEditFunc edit_cb;
01811     
01812     /* filter data */
01813     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
01814     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
01815     
01816     /* get beztriple editing callbacks */
01817     edit_cb= ANIM_editkeyframes_snap(mode);
01818     
01819     memset(&ked, 0, sizeof(KeyframeEditData)); 
01820     ked.scene= ac->scene;
01821     if (mode == GRAPHKEYS_SNAP_NEAREST_MARKER) {
01822         ked.list.first= (ac->markers) ? ac->markers->first : NULL;
01823         ked.list.last= (ac->markers) ? ac->markers->last : NULL;
01824     }
01825     else if (mode == GRAPHKEYS_SNAP_VALUE) {
01826         SpaceIpo *sipo= (SpaceIpo *)ac->sl;
01827         ked.f1= (sipo) ? sipo->cursorVal : 0.0f;
01828     }
01829     
01830     /* snap keyframes */
01831     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
01832         AnimData *adt= ANIM_nla_mapping_get(ac, ale);
01833         
01834         /* apply unit corrections */
01835         ANIM_unit_mapping_apply_fcurve(ac->scene, ale->id, ale->key_data, 0);
01836         
01837         if (adt) {
01838             ANIM_nla_mapping_apply_fcurve(adt, ale->key_data, 0, 1); 
01839             ANIM_fcurve_keyframes_loop(&ked, ale->key_data, NULL, edit_cb, calchandles_fcurve);
01840             ANIM_nla_mapping_apply_fcurve(adt, ale->key_data, 1, 1);
01841         }
01842         else 
01843             ANIM_fcurve_keyframes_loop(&ked, ale->key_data, NULL, edit_cb, calchandles_fcurve);
01844             
01845         /* apply unit corrections */
01846         ANIM_unit_mapping_apply_fcurve(ac->scene, ale->id, ale->key_data, ANIM_UNITCONV_RESTORE);
01847     }
01848     
01849     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
01850 }
01851 
01852 /* ------------------- */
01853 
01854 static int graphkeys_snap_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01855 {
01856     bAnimContext ac;
01857     short mode;
01858     
01859     /* get editor data */
01860     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
01861         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01862         
01863     /* get snapping mode */
01864     mode= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
01865     
01866     /* snap keyframes */
01867     snap_graph_keys(&ac, mode);
01868     
01869     /* validate keyframes after editing */
01870     ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
01871     
01872     /* set notifier that keyframes have changed */
01873     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
01874     
01875     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01876 }
01877  
01878 void GRAPH_OT_snap (wmOperatorType *ot)
01879 {
01880     /* identifiers */
01881     ot->name = "Snap Keys";
01882     ot->idname = "GRAPH_OT_snap";
01883     ot->description = "Snap selected keyframes to the chosen times/values";
01884     
01885     /* api callbacks */
01886     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
01887     ot->exec = graphkeys_snap_exec;
01888     ot->poll = graphop_editable_keyframes_poll;
01889     
01890     /* flags */
01891     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01892     
01893     /* id-props */
01894     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", prop_graphkeys_snap_types, 0, "Type", "");
01895 }

01897 /* ******************** Mirror Keyframes Operator *********************** */
01898 
01899 /* defines for mirror keyframes tool */
01900 static EnumPropertyItem prop_graphkeys_mirror_types[] = {
01901     {GRAPHKEYS_MIRROR_CFRA, "CFRA", 0, "By Times over Current Frame", ""},
01902     {GRAPHKEYS_MIRROR_VALUE, "VALUE", 0, "By Values over Cursor Value", ""},
01903     {GRAPHKEYS_MIRROR_YAXIS, "YAXIS", 0, "By Times over Time=0", ""},
01904     {GRAPHKEYS_MIRROR_XAXIS, "XAXIS", 0, "By Values over Value=0", ""},
01905     {GRAPHKEYS_MIRROR_MARKER, "MARKER", 0, "By Times over First Selected Marker", ""},
01906     {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
01907 };
01908 
01909 /* this function is responsible for mirroring keyframes */
01910 static void mirror_graph_keys(bAnimContext *ac, short mode) 
01911 {
01912     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
01913     bAnimListElem *ale;
01914     int filter;
01915     
01916     KeyframeEditData ked;
01917     KeyframeEditFunc edit_cb;
01918     
01919     /* get beztriple editing callbacks */
01920     edit_cb= ANIM_editkeyframes_mirror(mode);
01921     
01922     memset(&ked, 0, sizeof(KeyframeEditData)); 
01923     ked.scene= ac->scene;
01924     
01925     /* for 'first selected marker' mode, need to find first selected marker first! */
01926     // XXX should this be made into a helper func in the API?
01927     if (mode == GRAPHKEYS_MIRROR_MARKER) {
01928         TimeMarker *marker= NULL;
01929         
01930         /* find first selected marker */
01931         marker= ED_markers_get_first_selected(ac->markers);
01932         
01933         /* store marker's time (if available) */
01934         if (marker)
01935             ked.f1= (float)marker->frame;
01936         else
01937             return;
01938     }
01939     else if (mode == GRAPHKEYS_MIRROR_VALUE) {
01940         SpaceIpo *sipo= (SpaceIpo *)ac->sl;
01941         ked.f1= (sipo) ? sipo->cursorVal : 0.0f;
01942     }
01943     
01944     /* filter data */
01945     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
01946     ANIM_animdata_filter(ac, &anim_data, filter, ac->data, ac->datatype);
01947     
01948     /* mirror keyframes */
01949     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
01950         AnimData *adt= ANIM_nla_mapping_get(ac, ale);
01951         
01952         /* apply unit corrections */
01953         ANIM_unit_mapping_apply_fcurve(ac->scene, ale->id, ale->key_data, ANIM_UNITCONV_ONLYKEYS);
01954         
01955         if (adt) {
01956             ANIM_nla_mapping_apply_fcurve(adt, ale->key_data, 0, 1); 
01957             ANIM_fcurve_keyframes_loop(&ked, ale->key_data, NULL, edit_cb, calchandles_fcurve);
01958             ANIM_nla_mapping_apply_fcurve(adt, ale->key_data, 1, 1);
01959         }
01960         else 
01961             ANIM_fcurve_keyframes_loop(&ked, ale->key_data, NULL, edit_cb, calchandles_fcurve);
01962             
01963         /* unapply unit corrections */
01964         ANIM_unit_mapping_apply_fcurve(ac->scene, ale->id, ale->key_data, ANIM_UNITCONV_ONLYKEYS|ANIM_UNITCONV_RESTORE);
01965     }
01966     
01967     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
01968 }
01969 
01970 /* ------------------- */
01971 
01972 static int graphkeys_mirror_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01973 {
01974     bAnimContext ac;
01975     short mode;
01976     
01977     /* get editor data */
01978     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
01979         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01980         
01981     /* get mirroring mode */
01982     mode= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
01983     
01984     /* mirror keyframes */
01985     mirror_graph_keys(&ac, mode);
01986     
01987     /* validate keyframes after editing */
01988     ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
01989     
01990     /* set notifier that keyframes have changed */
01991     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
01992     
01993     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01994 }

02015 /* ******************** Smooth Keyframes Operator *********************** */
02016 
02017 static int graphkeys_smooth_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
02018 {
02019     bAnimContext ac;
02020     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
02021     bAnimListElem *ale;
02022     int filter;
02023     
02024     /* get editor data */
02025     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
02026         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02027     
02028     /* filter data */
02029     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
02030     ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
02031     
02032     /* smooth keyframes */
02033     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
02034         /* For now, we can only smooth by flattening handles AND smoothing curve values.
02035          * Perhaps the mode argument could be removed, as that functionality is offerred through 
02036          * Snap->Flatten Handles anyway.
02037          */
02038         smooth_fcurve(ale->key_data);
02039     }
02040     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
02041     
02042     /* validate keyframes after editing */
02043     ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
02044     
02045     /* set notifier that keyframes have changed */
02046     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
02047     
02048     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02049 }

02066 /* ************************************************************************** */
02067 /* F-CURVE MODIFIERS */
02068 
02069 /* ******************** Add F-Modifier Operator *********************** */
02070 
02071 /* present a special customised popup menu for this, with some filtering */
02072 static int graph_fmodifier_add_invoke (bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
02073 {
02074     wmOperatorType *ot = WM_operatortype_find("GRAPH_OT_fmodifier_add", 1);
02075     uiPopupMenu *pup;
02076     uiLayout *layout;
02077     int i;
02078     
02079     pup= uiPupMenuBegin(C, IFACE_("Add F-Curve Modifier"), ICON_NONE);
02080     layout= uiPupMenuLayout(pup);
02081     
02082     /* start from 1 to skip the 'Invalid' modifier type */
02083     for (i = 1; i < FMODIFIER_NUM_TYPES; i++) {
02084         FModifierTypeInfo *fmi= get_fmodifier_typeinfo(i);
02085         PointerRNA props_ptr;
02086         
02087         /* check if modifier is valid for this context */
02088         if (fmi == NULL)
02089             continue;
02090         
02091         /* create operator menu item with relevant properties filled in */
02092         props_ptr= uiItemFullO_ptr(layout, ot, IFACE_(fmi->name), ICON_NONE,
02093                                    NULL, WM_OP_EXEC_REGION_WIN, UI_ITEM_O_RETURN_PROPS);
02094             /* the only thing that gets set from the menu is the type of F-Modifier to add */
02095         RNA_enum_set(&props_ptr, "type", i);
02096             /* the following properties are just repeats of existing ones... */
02097         RNA_boolean_set(&props_ptr, "only_active", RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "only_active"));
02098     }
02099     uiItemS(layout);
02100     
02101     uiPupMenuEnd(C, pup);
02102     
02103     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02104 }
02105 
02106 static int graph_fmodifier_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02107 {
02108     bAnimContext ac;
02109     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
02110     bAnimListElem *ale;
02111     int filter;
02112     short type;
02113     
02114     /* get editor data */
02115     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
02116         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02117     
02118     /* get type of modifier to add */
02119     type= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
02120     
02121     /* filter data */
02122     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT | ANIMFILTER_NODUPLIS);
02123     if (RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "only_active"))
02124         filter |= ANIMFILTER_ACTIVE; // FIXME: enforce in this case only a single channel to get handled?
02125     else
02126         filter |= (ANIMFILTER_SEL|ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE);
02127     ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
02128     
02129     /* add f-modifier to each curve */
02130     for (ale= anim_data.first; ale; ale= ale->next) {
02131         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->data;
02132         FModifier *fcm;
02133         
02134         /* add F-Modifier of specified type to active F-Curve, and make it the active one */
02135         fcm= add_fmodifier(&fcu->modifiers, type);
02136         if (fcm)
02137             set_active_fmodifier(&fcu->modifiers, fcm);
02138         else {
02139             BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Modifier couldn't be added, see console for details");
02140             break;
02141         }
02142     }
02143     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
02144     
02145     /* validate keyframes after editing */
02146     ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
02147     
02148     /* set notifier that things have changed */
02149     // FIXME: this really isn't the best description for it...
02150     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION, NULL);
02151     
02152     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02153 }
02154  
02155 void GRAPH_OT_fmodifier_add (wmOperatorType *ot)
02156 {
02157     /* identifiers */
02158     ot->name = "Add F-Curve Modifier";
02159     ot->idname = "GRAPH_OT_fmodifier_add";
02160     ot->description = "Add F-Modifiers to the selected F-Curves";
02161     
02162     /* api callbacks */
02163     ot->invoke = graph_fmodifier_add_invoke;
02164     ot->exec = graph_fmodifier_add_exec;
02165     ot->poll = graphop_selected_fcurve_poll; 
02166     
02167     /* flags */
02168     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02169     
02170     /* id-props */
02171     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", fmodifier_type_items, 0, "Type", "");
02172     RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "only_active", 1, "Only Active", "Only add F-Modifier to active F-Curve");
02173 }
02174 
02175 /* ******************** Copy F-Modifiers Operator *********************** */
02176 
02177 static int graph_fmodifier_copy_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02178 {
02179     bAnimContext ac;
02180     bAnimListElem *ale;
02181     short ok = 0;
02182     
02183     /* get editor data */
02184     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
02185         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02186     
02187     /* clear buffer first */
02188     free_fmodifiers_copybuf();
02189     
02190     /* get the active F-Curve */
02191     ale= get_active_fcurve_channel(&ac);
02192     
02193     /* if this exists, call the copy F-Modifiers API function */
02194     if (ale && ale->data) {
02195         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->data;
02196         
02197         // TODO: when 'active' vs 'all' boolean is added, change last param!
02198         ok= ANIM_fmodifiers_copy_to_buf(&fcu->modifiers, 0);
02199         
02200         /* free temp data now */
02201         MEM_freeN(ale);
02202     }
02203     
02204     /* successful or not? */
02205     if (ok == 0) {
02206         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "No F-Modifiers available to be copied");
02207         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02208     }
02209     else
02210         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02211 }
02212  
02213 void GRAPH_OT_fmodifier_copy (wmOperatorType *ot)
02214 {
02215     /* identifiers */
02216     ot->name = "Copy F-Modifiers";
02217     ot->idname = "GRAPH_OT_fmodifier_copy";
02218     ot->description = "Copy the F-Modifier(s) of the active F-Curve";
02219     
02220     /* api callbacks */
02221     ot->exec = graph_fmodifier_copy_exec;
02222     ot->poll = graphop_active_fcurve_poll; 
02223     
02224     /* flags */
02225     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02226     
02227     /* id-props */
02228     //ot->prop = RNA_def_boolean(ot->srna, "all", 1, "All F-Modifiers", "Copy all the F-Modifiers, instead of just the active one");
02229 }
02230 
02231 /* ******************** Paste F-Modifiers Operator *********************** */
02232 
02233 static int graph_fmodifier_paste_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
02234 {
02235     bAnimContext ac;
02236     ListBase anim_data = {NULL, NULL};
02237     bAnimListElem *ale;
02238     int filter, ok=0;
02239     
02240     /* get editor data */
02241     if (ANIM_animdata_get_context(C, &ac) == 0)
02242         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02243     
02244     /* filter data */
02245     filter= (ANIMFILTER_DATA_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_CURVE_VISIBLE | ANIMFILTER_SEL | ANIMFILTER_FOREDIT);
02246     ANIM_animdata_filter(&ac, &anim_data, filter, ac.data, ac.datatype);
02247     
02248     /* paste modifiers */
02249     for (ale = anim_data.first; ale; ale = ale->next) {
02250         FCurve *fcu= (FCurve *)ale->data;
02251         
02252         // TODO: do we want to replace existing modifiers? add user pref for that!
02253         ok += ANIM_fmodifiers_paste_from_buf(&fcu->modifiers, 0);
02254     }
02255     
02256     /* clean up */
02257     BLI_freelistN(&anim_data);
02258     
02259     /* successful or not? */
02260     if (ok) {
02261         /* validate keyframes after editing */
02262         ANIM_editkeyframes_refresh(&ac);
02263         
02264         /* set notifier that keyframes have changed */
02265         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
02266         
02267         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
02268     }
02269     else {
02270         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "No F-Modifiers to paste");
02271         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
02272     }
02273 }
02274  
02275 void GRAPH_OT_fmodifier_paste (wmOperatorType *ot)
02276 {
02277     /* identifiers */
02278     ot->name = "Paste F-Modifiers";
02279     ot->idname = "GRAPH_OT_fmodifier_paste";
02280     ot->description = "Add copied F-Modifiers to the selected F-Curves";
02281     
02282     /* api callbacks */
02283     ot->exec = graph_fmodifier_paste_exec;
02284     ot->poll = graphop_active_fcurve_poll;
02285     
02286     /* flags */
02287     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
02288 }
